All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Conversion
Conversion transaction table entity.
ConversionController
Controller includes APIs related to conversion operations.
ConversionFailed
Error response object for conversion operation.
ConversionListResponse
Response object for conversion list operation.
ConversionRepository
Repository interface used for conversion table.
ConversionRequest
Request object for conversion operation.
ConversionResponse
Conversion response interface used by factory.
ConversionSuccess
Successful response object for conversion operation.
CurrencyApiSettings
Settings for currency API client.
CurrencyInMemoryRepository
In memory repository to save currency names.
ErrorTypes
Response codes used in error responses.
ExchangeController
Contains API endpoints used to calculate exchange rates.
ExchangeRateFailed
Error response object for exchange rate operation.
ExchangeRateResponse
Exchange rate response interface used by factory.
ExchangeRateSuccess
Response object required to perform the exchange rate operation.
FxService
Service class where necessary logical operations are done in APIs.
LatestExchangeRates
The client object used for the response returned from the currency API.
SimpleFxApiApplication
Application run class.
SimpleFxApiConfiguration
Contains the bean definitions to be processed by the Spring container to generate bean definitions and service requests for those beans at runtime.
